name: Final Human vs. Zombie Hordes
description:
Final Human vs. Zombie Hordes is a tower defense style game where you kill as many zombies as you can before they kill you.

This game was made in less than 6 days as part of Nokia3310 Game Jam 4.

Apologies in advance for the bugs. >:}

Controls:

Arrow Keys: move character

Space Bar: fire

Enter key: Change Screens

Pick up items for damage upgrades or bomb drops.
